gettingStarted.title: Getting Started with Apper
gettingStarted.description: Learn how to create amazing applications using Apper's simple conversation-based approach

sections.title: What is Apper?
sections.content: Apper is a revolutionary platform that lets you create professional web applications by simply describing what you want in plain English. Think of it as having a conversation with a skilled developer who understands exactly what you need and builds it for you instantly. No coding knowledge required!
highlights: Build apps by describing them in natural language
No coding or technical skills needed
Professional results in minutes, not months
Real applications that work on all devices

sections.title: How Apper Works
sections.content: Apper uses advanced AI to understand your app ideas and turn them into real, working applications. Here's the simple process:

steps.title: Describe Your App
steps.description: Simply tell Apper what kind of app you want to create. For example: 'I want a restaurant website with a menu, contact form, and online ordering.'

steps.title: Apper Builds It
steps.description: Our AI instantly creates your application based on your description, including all the features you requested.

steps.title: Customize and Refine
steps.description: Make changes by asking for them naturally: 'Change the color to blue' or 'Add a photo gallery section.'

steps.title: Publish and Share
steps.description: When you're happy with your app, publish it with one click and share it with the world!

sections.title: Creating Your First App with a Prompt
sections.content: Getting started is incredibly simple. Here's how to create your first application:

steps.title: Start a New Project
steps.description: Click 'Create New App' and you'll see a text box where you can describe your idea.

steps.title: Write Your Prompt
steps.description: Describe your app clearly. Good examples: 'Create a portfolio website for a photographer' or 'Build a task management app for small teams.'

steps.title: Be Specific
steps.description: Include details about features you want: contact forms, image galleries, user accounts, payment processing, etc.

steps.title: Submit and Watch
steps.description: Hit enter and watch as Apper builds your application in real-time. This usually takes just a few minutes!

sections.title: Customizing Your App
sections.content: Once your app is created, you can easily customize every aspect of it using simple conversational commands:

features.name: Design Changes
features.description: Modify colors, fonts, layouts, and styling with simple requests.
features.howToUse: Say things like 'Make the header blue' or 'Use a modern font throughout the site' and Apper will apply the changes instantly.

features.name: Adding Pages
features.description: Add new pages and sections to expand your application's functionality.
features.howToUse: Request new pages by saying 'Add an About Us page' or 'Create a blog section' and Apper will build them with appropriate content and styling.

features.name: Feature Enhancement
features.description: Add new features or modify existing ones without any technical complexity.
features.howToUse: Ask for features like 'Add a search function' or 'Include social media sharing buttons' and they'll be integrated seamlessly.

features.name: Mobile Optimization
features.description: Ensure your app looks perfect on all devices with responsive design adjustments.
features.howToUse: Request mobile improvements by saying 'Make the navigation mobile-friendly' or 'Optimize for tablet viewing' and Apper handles the technical details.

sections.title: Setting Up User Authentication
sections.content: Adding user accounts and authentication to your app is simple with Apper:

steps.title: Request User Accounts
steps.description: Tell Apper: 'Add user registration and login functionality' and it will create a complete authentication system.

steps.title: Customize User Experience
steps.description: Specify what you want: 'Users should be able to create profiles with photos' or 'Add password reset functionality.'

steps.title: Set Permissions
steps.description: Define who can access what: 'Only logged-in users can post comments' or 'Admins can manage all content.'

steps.title: Test and Launch
steps.description: Apper creates test accounts so you can verify everything works before going live.

sections.title: Adding Payment Processing
sections.content: Monetize your app by adding secure payment processing with just a simple request:

features.name: Payment Integration
features.description: Accept credit cards, PayPal, and other payment methods securely.
features.howToUse: Simply ask: 'Add payment processing for selling products' and Apper integrates industry-standard payment systems with full security.

features.name: E-commerce Features
features.description: Create shopping carts, product catalogs, and order management systems.
features.howToUse: Request features like 'Add a shopping cart' or 'Create a product catalog with categories' and get a fully functional online store.

features.name: Subscription Management
features.description: Set up recurring payments and subscription services for your users.
features.howToUse: Ask for 'monthly subscription billing' or 'premium membership options' and Apper creates the complete subscription infrastructure.

features.name: Security & Compliance
features.description: All payment processing includes industry-standard security and compliance measures.
features.howToUse: Apper automatically implements PCI compliance, SSL encryption, and secure payment handling without any technical setup required.

sections.title: Publishing Your App
sections.content: When your app is ready, publishing it to the web is incredibly simple:

steps.title: Review Your App
steps.description: Test all features and make sure everything works exactly as you want it.

steps.title: Choose Your Domain
steps.description: Use a free Apper subdomain or connect your own custom domain name.

steps.title: Click Publish
steps.description: One click and your app is live on the internet with professional hosting and security.

steps.title: Share and Promote
steps.description: Get a shareable link and start promoting your new application to the world!

faq.question: Do I need any technical skills to use Apper?
faq.answer: Not at all! Apper is designed for everyone, regardless of technical background. If you can describe what you want in plain English, you can create professional applications with Apper.

faq.question: How long does it take to create an app?
faq.answer: Most applications are created within minutes of submitting your prompt. Complex apps with many features might take a bit longer, but you'll see progress in real-time as Apper builds your application.

faq.question: What if I want to change something after my app is created?
faq.answer: Making changes is easy! Just describe what you'd like to modify, and Apper will update your application accordingly. There's no limit to how many changes you can make.

faq.question: Can I create any type of application?
faq.answer: Apper can create a wide variety of web applications including business websites, e-commerce stores, portfolios, blogs, booking systems, and much more. If you can describe it, Apper can likely build it!

faq.question: How much does it cost to publish my app?
faq.answer: Apper includes hosting and a subdomain for free. If you want to use your own custom domain or need advanced features, premium plans are available with transparent pricing.

faq.question: Is my app secure and reliable?
faq.answer: Yes! All Apper applications include industry-standard security measures, SSL encryption, and reliable hosting. Your users' data and your application are fully protected.

faq.question: Can I collaborate with others on my app?
faq.answer: Absolutely! You can invite team members to work on your application together. Everyone can make changes and suggestions using the same conversational interface.

faq.question: What happens if I need help or support?
faq.answer: Apper includes comprehensive support to help you succeed. Our AI assistant can answer questions, and our support team is available to help with any challenges you encounter.

tips.title: Be Specific in Your Prompts
tips.description: The more details you provide about what you want, the better Apper can create exactly what you envision. Include information about colors, layout preferences, and specific features you need.

tips.title: Start Simple, Then Expand
tips.description: Begin with a basic version of your app and then add features gradually. This approach helps you see progress quickly and ensures each addition works perfectly with what you already have.

tips.title: Use Real Examples
tips.description: When describing your app, reference websites or applications you admire. Saying 'make it like Amazon but for books' gives Apper a clear direction to follow.

tips.title: Test Everything Before Publishing
tips.description: Try all the features of your app before going live. Click every button, fill out every form, and make sure the user experience is exactly what you want.

tips.title: Think About Your Users
tips.description: Consider who will use your app and what they need to accomplish. Describing user scenarios helps Apper create a more intuitive and user-friendly application.

tips.title: Iterate and Improve
tips.description: Don't be afraid to ask for changes multiple times. Apper makes it easy to refine your application until it's exactly what you want. Perfection comes through iteration.
